original_text: so that the blood of all the prophets, shed from the foundation of the world, may be charged against this generation,
korean_text: 창세 이후로 흘린 모든 선지자의 피를 이 세대가 담당하되

sentences.original_text: so that the blood of all the prophets
shed from the foundation of the world
may be charged against this generation
